abstract: The model Iris Egbers is transformed by Peter Phillips and Guido Palau.
snippet: The model Iris Egbers is transformed by Peter Phillips and Guido Palau.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Greg Kessler captures the transformations of Paris Fashion Week. Here, the model Iris Egbers from Supreme Model Management before (left) and after (right) transforms, with makeup by Peter Phillips for Chanel Beauté and hair by Guido Palau for Redken. (Drag the orange bar left to reveal the full transformation.)

headline.main: Model-Morphosis | Iris Egbers at Alexander McQueen
